title: It's Honestly Hard to Believe
body: In the same patch that made {{champion:91}} have to work twice as hard to get half the kills, {{champion:107}} now has a cleanse on, and basically everything else that an assassin would ever want. It's like a parent beating one of his kids to death while buying the other a Happy Meal. At least I had a good laugh out of the patch note, I guess.

replies.body: I dont understand, is a happy meal better than being beaten?
You're gonna die from both anyways
damn that's a good point, can't argue, WP
